div.title: Percentage of happy ratings over the past 30 days. Get rating details from the More menu.

group.name: timesheet_error
group.div: You can not log timesheets on this project since is linked to an inactive analytic account. Please change it, or reactivate the current one to timesheet on the project.

record.field: Odoo Studio: Default calendar view for project.project customization

field.name: duration
field.help: Time the currently logged user spent on this workorder.
